about_the_game:
The Collector

In "The Collector", you will be immersed in an intense third-person action, adventure and horror experience. Take on the role of Bianca, accompanied by her father Henry, as they explore a mysterious town that disappeared years ago. Trapped in this enigmatic environment, they will face terrifying challenges as they search for answers and fight for survival.

Key Features:

Supernatural Adventure: Explore the dark corners of a vanished city, revealing haunting mysteries and discovering the sinister past that surrounds it.

Immersive Over-the-Shoulder Gameplay: Immerse yourself in the action with over-the-shoulder gameplay that delivers a cinematic experience and heightens the tension in every encounter.

Powerful Weapons: Choose from a variety of powerful weapons to face terrifying enemies. Accuracy is vital, and each weapon choice directly affects your ability to survive.

Challenging Exploration: Navigate intricate, danger-filled environments, discover hidden secrets, and unlock new areas while facing tough enemies.

Intriguing Narrative: Uncover the gripping plot that drives Bianca and Henry to uncover the mysteries behind the city's disappearance, while facing the constant threat that lurks in the shadows.

"The Collector" offers an experience combining action with a dose of horror, challenging exploration and a mysterious plot. Are you ready to face the terrors that await in the vanished city?

content_descriptors.notes: The game features decapitation, with some death endings for both the character and the game's enemies. It features bloodshed, and vulgar language.

name: The Collector

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce MX110
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A third-person action-adventure game with horror elements.
supported_languages:
English, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
